content: We are traveling, the dogs and I, and we respond to dips and turns and rises in the terrain as instinctively as a person would shield the aureate sun from their eyes or pull their hand away from a hot flame.
translations: ita:Stiamo viaggiando, io e i cani, e reagiamo alle discese, alle curve e alle salite del terreno con la stessa istintivit√†
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Cangarejo (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
